summary: This is an email from August 8, 2022, regarding the preparation of a draft letter on agency letterhead and a law enforcement certification form (I-914) for an investigation. The sender is providing attachments and requesting feedback.
keyFacts: An email was sent on August 8, 2022, concerning an investigation.
The email includes a draft letter that needs to be placed on agency letterhead.
The email attaches a draft I-914 Supplement B, which is a law enforcement certification form.
The sender is coordinating document preparation for an unspecified investigation.
